channel.title: 508 server help
channel.description:
Can you please answer these questions.
[code]1.) What is the best 508 source to use 2.) How do i code a 508's main file, like a 317's main file in "client.java". What is a 508's main file? 3.) What's the best client to use 4.) I need help coding a 508, because i don't know what file i code in.[/code]
If you can answer these questions, it'd be really great. I'm over 317's and i want to try out a 508 for a change. Thank-you for your help and i hope to hear from you soon.

item.title: 508 server help
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

this is how a 508 runs

The main file is main.java, but u dont do that much work there not like a 317 client.java

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server help
item.dc:creator: @mark033 mark033
item.description:
@mark033 wrote:

I can’t help you with questions 1 and 3, but 2 and 4 can be answered by readng a sticky:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,435567.0.html

Scroll down to the “508 Tutorials” section.

Read full topic
